com.scriptrts.core.ui
Class Console

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.scriptrts.core.ui.Console
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class Console
extends javax.swing.JPanel

In-game terminal implemented as a Swing component. The terminal consists of a text field and a text area. The text area is the output, while the text field is the input. When the user is done inputting, the console evaluates the input as Python code and appends output to the text area.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

Console

public Console(int consoleHeight,
               int screenWidth)
Create a new console.

Parameters:
consoleHeight - the height to fit the console into
screenWidth - the desired width of the console
Method Detail

calibrated

public static boolean calibrated()
Returns whether the character size has been calculated. If it hasn't, then the console should be calibrated with the help of a Graphics object representing the current graphics configuration.

calibrateFont

public static void calibrateFont(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
Calibrate the console font for the current graphics configuration. Must be called before the console is used.
